name: Chlothar
desc: A pure-blood Khaenri'ahn who was cursed with immortality by Celestia. He is a member of the Alberich Clan and the founder of the Abyss Order.

customize.name: Caribert
customize.desc: Chlothar Alberich's illegitimate son who became a hilichurl due to the Heavenly Principles' curse. He was used to create the Loom of Fate.

customize.text: Chlothar's illegitimate son who became a hilichurl and fell into a coma after the Cataclysm. Chlothar used an Abyssal power to cure his son and wanted him to become the

customize.name: Loom of Fate
customize.desc: A device created by the Abyss Order that is capable of weaving Ley Lines.

customize.text:
.
Vedrfolnir
"The Visionary," one of the five Sinners of Khaenri'ah, a transcendent being who answered Chlothar's prayers and helped his son. Chlothar swore to honor the "god" that has honored his wishes.
Under Vedrfolnir's influence, Alberich established the Abyss Order.
Abyss Order
An organization established by Chlothar Alberich. Its main goal is to destroy the nations watched over by The Seven because of the destruction of Khaenri'ah by the gods.
Sibling
The Traveler's sibling who became the Princess/Prince of the Abyss Order.

customize.name: Kaeya
customize.desc: An accomplished swordsman and a strategic thinker in the Knights of Favonius, rumored to hail from beyond Mondstadt.
